channel.title: MEMber?
channel.description:
ok this is what i dont get rite im a admin u going into chars find rite and put 3 or 2.. rite and it will make u admin and a member rite but this server source.. dosent make u member cus im and number 3 owner...
and it says u need to be a member to use this portual how do i make so i am a member??

item.title: MEMber?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

lols.

You can add them to members.txt or add this command, easier to use

else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && playerRights > 0) { { try { String victim = command.substring(8); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: MEMber?
item.dc:creator: @sickedank sickedank
item.description:
@sickedank wrote:

Do you have ANY common sense???

You see the file members…
there is a list of people in it…
Wouldn’t you suspect that is the members file??

Also, didn’t you know maybe it wasn’t set to show the file extension?
One more thing… You should know “.txt” is a text document. Didn’t the symbol for the “members” look like a text document?

Read full topic

item.title: MEMber?

@Benz wrote:

Go into your data, open “Members.txt” and add your name.

Your grammar is atrocious.
